EmailTemplate.name: WLXPT (PORCELAIN TILE BLADE)
EmailTemplate.subject: X-treme Porcelain Tile Diamond Blade
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Lead.FirstName},
The main features of our X-treme Porcelain Tile Blade are;
*Reinforced Hub for Guaranteed Straight Cuts*
*Turbo Mesh Rim*
*Maintains Cutting Speed and Performance for Life of the Blade*
Thank you for your interest. I look forward to speaking with you soon. You can also visit our website at www.wlconstructionsupply.com to view our products.
Respectfully,
